title: How long has The Wilmington bouncer/Doorman,Craig Shepard, been working Historic dist bars and clubs? He is a big part of the nightlife-I went to college, got married and have children now and he looks the same and is still bouncing!
text: Here's a link to the answer to your question. http://www.starnewsonline.com/article/20091107/COLUMNIST/911079991?p=1&tc=pg
